column1: length ball in the channel, a bit of a wobble in the air, left alone by Rahul
length ball, coming in with the angle, Rahul was looking to play on the leg side, gets hit on the pads, a mild appeal for lbw but was a bit too high. A forward short leg is in position
in two minds there Rahul, length ball outside off, Rahul was looking to play initially, tries to take his bat out in the end, ends up dabbing towards slips
length ball outside off once again, stays beside the line and defends it on on the off side
length ball, much closer to the stumps, stays inside the crease and defends
a touch fuller this time, just outside off, Rahul comes forward to defend but the ball jags in, takes an inside edge on to the pads
length ball, holds it's line and Mayank shoulders his arms
back of a length, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to block off the back foot
fuller, and he rocks back to defend with the bat's face open
searing from Gabriel, back of a length just outside off, and he does well to sway out of the ball's way
fuller again, and he prods forward to block towards cover, and off they go for India's first run
just past his outside edge! Gabriel asking the right questions. Length ball, moving inwards sharply, and Rahul's too late to come forward and defend. Ball whizzes past his bat
full, just outside off, and he pushes forward to drive past the bowler's left! Brathwaite gives the ball a mighty chase, and parries it back too, but it looks like he was touching the boundary
back of a length, just outside off, and he lets this go through to the keeper
back of a length, just outside off, and he shoulders his arms once more
full, coming into his pads, and worked off his pads to the leg side. Can't pierce the gap though - straight to midwicket
full, just outside off, but the ball holds it's line while Mayank was expecting it to come inwards. Big gap between bat and ball, and straight into the keeper's gloves
length ball, just outside off, and this time the ball seams inwards as if it's hit a crack on the deck. Mayank isn't near the ball and he looks at the pitch to investigate where that pitched
full, just outside off, and Rahul gets forward with a big stride but shoulders his arms instead
back of a length, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to block off the back foot
back of a length, just outside off, and he covers his stumps before shouldering his arms
back of a length, but way too wide outside off stump. Left alone, happily
back of a length, outside off stump,  and he covers his stumps before shouldering once more
full, but wide outside off, and he's happy to let that go into the keeper's gloves
he's fishing! Mayank tries to meet this length ball with the bat's open face, but slightly indecisive. Ball goes past his outside edge

big appeal for caught behind! But not given by the umpire. WI review! The big question is whether that was off the bat or pad. It was a full ball on off stump that Mayank tried to meet on the front foot. But the ball held its line, and therefore found Mayank's outside edge. Pad nowhere near the bat, this is clear as daylight. Kettleborough changes his decision and that's DRS 1, Umpire 0
hits his shoulder! Pujara winces marginally before saying he's okay. Back of a length, on off and angling in. Pujara took his eyes off the ball and didn't duck either
fuller, on off stump, and defended off the front foot. Back to the bowler
overpitched on middle, and clipped off his toes past midwicket. Two to get off the mark

and Pujara goes too! Length ball outside off, and once again the marginal movement - away from the batsman after hitting the deck - has found his outside edge. Tried to fend this off the front foot, with the bat facing downwards, but the ball took a feather edge off his blade and that's bye bye, Pujara
full, just outside off, and he shoulders his arms
shoveled off the front foot through the covers. Fielder gives it a chase to retrieve the ball, but can't stop KL Rahul from getting his first runs of the match
full, on off, and he tries to drive through mid-on, but the bat's face turns in his hand. Spliced to midwicket
full, outside off, and Kohli opens the bat's face to drive. Finds the gap behind point and that's Virat off the mark too
back of a length outside off, and seaming inwards. Kohli covers his stumps and then shoulders his arms
back of a length, outside off but seaming inwards again. Kohli shoulders his arms once again, but this time the ball raps his thigh guard. Too high so nobody bothers appealing
fullish, just outside off. He prods forward to defend with soft hands
back of a length, but the ball doesn't bounce as much. Rahul defends off the back foot, but meets it near his abs
length ball outside off, and Rahul walks across before shouldering his arms. Went so wide across that he ended up exposing two stumps
full outside off, and he plays a check-drive into the off side for a quick run
full, on off stump, and driven to mid-on
full, just outside off, and once again tapped into the gap. Kohli pushes Rahul for the swift run, and completely comfortably in the end
back of a length, too wide outside off stump and Kohli doesn't bother playing at it
full, just outside off, and he drives this beautifully past the umpire! Mid-on chases it, but in vain
full, outside off stump and Kohli pushes forward before shouldering his arms
fiery! Back of a length, on off stump, and rising quickly. Kohli tiptoes to defend, but his bat is swiftly near his face when the ball passes it. Nearly clipped his gloves

falls short of first slip but this was off his body anyway. Kohli tried to pull this short ball but it was a slower delivery, eventually hitting his shoulder. Bounces just in front of the slip fielder before rolling into the fine-leg boundary. No ball too

Kohli is out of here! Back of a length, landing outside off but angling in. Kohli tiptoes to cut it over point, but it flies off his blade too fine. The gully fielder dives to his right to take the catch, and it's the debutant Brooks who is under it! Game onnn!
length ball outside off, but the bowler's natural angle brings it in. Hits Rahane's thigh-guard as he tries to shoulder his arms, but once again too high for an appeal
full, just outside off, and he prods forward to defend
length ball on middle stump, but goes straight through instead of seaming in. Nearly squared the batsman up, but he manages to eventually defend off the back foot
full, just outside off, and he tries to meet the ball on the front foot. Extra bounce off the pitch, and that's hit Rahul's right elbow!
full, on off stump, and Rahul's feet are glued to the crease. Defends, but the ball flies off his blade to third man
full, on leg stump and angling further down the leg side. Rahane, though, did try to flick it behind square but couldn't make any connection
full, just outside off, and he takes a few steps forward to negate the angle. Defends to short cover
full, outside off, and he tries to play the cover drive. But the ball takes the bat's inside edge and flies past midwicket instead. Streaky
short and that forces Rahul to duck. Lands on off, but the batsman did well to spot the length early
back of a length on middle, and Rahul tiptoes to flick towards the leg side. Hits the bat's handle as he meets it with one hand. Has to be careful with short-leg lurking
back of a length, but nowhere near the batsman. Wide outside off, and left alone
fullish, outside off but seaming inwards. Rahul covers his stumps before shouldering his arms
searching for the yorker but Rahul manages to find enough of the bat's bottom-half to drive past Gabriel. Races towards the long-off boundary!
length ball, on off, and holding it's line. Defended off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and zipping straight through. He tiptoes to cut, but doesn't find the connection he wanted. Ball rolls away to point
length ball, just outside off stump, and fended away off the back foot
fuller, just outside off, and Rahane takes a big stride forward before shouldering his arms
length ball, just outside off, and he presses forward to meet the ball. Mistimes a defense to the off-side
fuller ball, on off, and Rahane makes a solid connection. Driven to mid-off. Drinks too
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards covers for a quick single
length ball around off, stays beside the line and defends it on the off side
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg to get off the mark
short of length outside off, Rahul gets on his toes and punches it towards gully, the fielder puts in a dive to avoid any runs
fuller on middle and leg, defended with bat in front of pads
length ball, around sixth stump, left alone by Rahul
length ball in the corridor, some extra bounce there for Holder, Rahane is happy to let it go
a touch fuller and straighter this time, Rahane comes forward and blocks
length ball, pitching just outside off and going away, shouldered arms again
short of length around off, stays back and defends with an angled bat
a touch fuller but way outside off, a bit of late movement as well but Rahane is not interested
length ball around fourth stump, Rahane pushes it towards point from the crease
back of length around off, stays on the back foot and defends
length ball around off, once again defended from the back foot
length ball around off, defended from the crease
fuller on the pads and clipped away gently towards midwicket for a couple
length ball, just outside off stumps, Rahul makes sure he has his bat and gloves well away from the ball
length ball on middle and leg, taps it towards square leg
length ball but well outside off, Rahane is not interested
fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
fuller around off once more, Rahane pushes it towards cover from the front foot
fuller around middle and off, Rahane pushes it back towards the bowler
length ball on middle and leg, looks to work on the leg side, misses and gets hit on the thigh
length ball around off, Rahane is half forward but manages to keep it out, pushed towards point
short of length but too wide outside off this time, Rahul rocks back and cuts it in front of the square for four, through the covers
length ball around off, defended from the crease
overpitched around off, Rahul just shows the full face of the bat and sends it between the bowler and mid-off for four more
fuller around off, comes forward and offers a solid defence
short of length around off, goes back and defends again, Rahul growing in confidence, nice sound off the bat too
length ball in the corridor, and left alone by Rahul
brilliant from Holder, brings back in after an over of outswing, Rahane was late and unprepared, the ball goes between the bat and pad
length ball around off, defended on the off side
length ball around fifth stump, Rahane comes forward before shouldering arms
fuller around off, comes forward and defends, the bottom hand coming off the handle at the last moment
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
length ball but once again way too outside off, no shot offered
fuller outside off, perhaps too full, left alone by Rahul
length ball outside off, coming back in a bit, shouldered arms again
length ball around off, defended from the crease towards backward point
pitched up on this occasion and Rahul leans into the drive, gets a couple only because of the sluggish outfield
length ball around off, comes forward and defends solidly towards cover
goes full around middle and leg, looking for the yorker, Rahul digs it out towards short midwicket
short of length outside off, moves further away, another dot as Rahane leaves it alone
finally a single, Holder bowling a touch straighter this time, tucked away towards square leg for a single, Rahane moves to 2 off 31
fuller but well outside off, left alone by Rahul
a bit fuller than length, Rahul defends it towards cover-point
length ball on middle and leg, flicked away towards fine leg
short of length on middle and leg, flicked towards deep square leg for one more
fuller outside off, around fifth stump and left alone by Rahul
length but way too outside off to draw any interest
length ball outside off and coming in a bit off the seam, defended from the back foot
fuller from Cummins and Rahul was just waiting for it, full face of the bat and four more to long-off
length ball around off stump, stays back and defends at the last moment
length ball but a bit too outside off, Rahul leaves it alone again, nice carry to the keeper
length ball around off, Rahane stays back and defends
fuller and wider outside off, leaving the batsman as well, left alone
fuller around off, comes forward and drives but straight towards mid-off
short of length around off and seaming away, shouldered arms
a thick outside edge but well short of the second slip, soft hands from Rahane, was a fuller one from Holder but the batsman was stuck in the crease, beats the second slip for four
length ball, in the corridor, Rahane leaves it alone
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover, a partial stop there allows a single
too full and way too outside off, left alone by Rahane
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends
length ball, starting from well outside off and coming in, Rahane leaves it alone
a touch fuller but around sixth stump, Rahane comes forward before shouldering arms
finally the bouncer, Rahane was a bit late but manages to pull it down towards deep square leg where Roach looks to stop it with his foot but makes a mess and ends up conceding a boundary
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards deep square leg, two is the call and they get two
back of length around off, defended from the crease
length ball on middle and leg, misses the flick and is struck on the thigh
length ball in the corridor, left alone by Rahul once again
fuller on middle and leg, plays it gently towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single, the fielder was on his heels
short of length outside off, looks to come forward but has to defend from the crease
fuller outside off, drives it towards covers but fails to find a gap
length ball in the corridor, left alone by Rahul
fuller outside off, pushed through covers, calls two and gets it easily
short of length outside off, extracting good bounce but Rahul stays away from the line of the ball
short of length but once again away from the batsman, Rahul is happy to let it go
length ball in the corridor, left alone by Rahul
length ball, just outside off, and left alone
length delivery but wider outside off. Seaming further away and left alone
length ball angling into his pads, and worked away to square leg. No chance of a single though
fullish, on off stump, and tapped to wide mid-on
full, on middle, and Rahane offers the bat's straight face to defend. Played back to Roach
full, on off and angling into his pads. Firmly defended back to Roach once more
full, just outside off, and the attempted front-foot defense takes an inside edge. Hits him right where it hurts men the most! He's on his knees...
length ball, just outside off, and he stays on the back foot before punching to cover. They scamper across for one
full, just outside off and he check-drives past mid-off. Fielder pulls it back - so just a single
nice sound! Full, just outside off, and he leans into a drive. Plays it into the ground, so the ball takes an awkward bounce, but not high enough to clear the fielder at cover
stellar! Overpitched, too wide, and he leans into a square drive - this time finding the gap between cover and point
full, but wide outside off. Rahul takes a giant stride to cover his off-stump before shouldering his arms
full, on middle, and tapped back to the bowler off the front foot
full, on middle, and tapped into the gap in front of midwicket. Rahul calls early for the single
full outside off, and a bit of swing away from the batsman. Rahane opens his shoulders, and thumps a drive past cover's left with ease for four
full, just outside off. Gently defended to cover
full, on off stump. Pushed back past the non-striker off the front foot
full, on off and angling into his pads. Blocked off the front foot
back of a length outside off but angling into his waist. Clipped off his hips behind square for a single
full just outside off, and he covers his stumps before shouldering his arms. Extra-good judgment, considering the ball was fairly close to the stumps
full, on off and he covers his stumps before driving to mid-on
full, just outside off, and he prods forward to shovel a straight-drive past the non-striker. Past mid-on, and the fielder doesn't even bother giving the ball a chase
full and wide outside off, and Rahane can't help but play at it. Attempts a cover drive, but misses altogether. Could've easily taken the outside edge
length ball outside off, and sizzling straight through to the keeper. Left alone by Rahane
length ball, just outside off, and he firmly punches off the back foot. Can't beat point though
full, on leg stump, and the leg-side clip takes a leading edge to point
full, on off and angling in. Tries to nudge it towards square-leg, but pads it instead
full, on off, and firmly blocked off the front foot to cover
full, on leg stump, and he attempts to drive with the straight bat. Fails to clear mid-on though
length ball outside off, and he shuffles across to cover off stump before shouldering his arms
length ball, just outside off, and fended off the back foot. Ball settles near Rahane's toes
full outside off, and the ball takes an awkward bounce into the keeper's gloves. Collected by Hope from near his face
full outside off, and he comes forward beautifully to meet this ball under his helmet. Caresses the drive too, but finds the fielder placed at mid-off
full, just outside off, and the front-foot defense takes an inside-edge. Ball rolls away to the leg side
length ball, just outside off, and he fends it away off the back foot
length ball, just outside off. Fended off the back foot to cover
length ball in the corridor, Rahul is happy to leave that alone
length ball around off, coming in after pitching, defended from the back foot
length ball around off, stays back and drops it on the off side, looks for a single but that's not there
fuller around off, leans into the drive but straight towards extra cover
length ball around off, goes deep inside the crease and turns it on the leg side
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it right under his eyes
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it in the direction of mid-on
fuller on the stumps and driven down the ground, Roach got a hand on it which helps Gabriel from mid-on to chase it down and pull just inside
fuller and wider, Rahul latches on it, a big front-foot booming drive through covers for four
short of length outside off, chops it towards cover-point
fuller outside off and driven again but straight towards mid-off this time
fuller around off, comes forward and plays it towards extra cover, was looking to steal a single but it went too fast towards the fielder
length ball outside off and coming in with the angle, left alone
fuller around off, looks to drive on the front foot but the doesn't quite middle it, the ball dribbles towards mid-off
length ball outside off, a bit of seam movement away, left alone
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends
length ball on middle and leg, Rahane misses the glance, an appeal for lbw but was heading down, collects a leg-bye to square leg
length ball around off, defends along the line of the ball
fuller around off, driven firmly but straight towards mid-on
length ball around off, Rahane gets behind it and defends with soft hands
length ball around off, moves across and defends towards short midwicket with a straight bat
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
length ball around off, a big front foot forward to smother it
length ball around off, stays back and defends
length ball around off, a bit of spin for Chase, stays back and defends

has he got Rahul? Down the leg side? Looks like, yes. It was fuller down the leg side, Rahul went for the glance, and perhaps got a feather, Hope does well to move towards the leg side and pouch it. Rahul looks at his partner and eventually decides to leave
fuller around off, comes forward and plays it towards short midwicket
down the leg side once again but Vihari leaves it alone
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
fuller on the stumps, works it towards short midwicket
fuller on the pads and clipped away off his legs, in front of square. The fielder can only chase it all the way
length ball outside off, left alone by Rahane
length ball around off, comes forward and leaves it alone once more
short of length outside off, coming in a bit after pitching, no shot offered
short of length but further away from the batsman, no interest shown
length ball outside off, and another leave from Rahane
length ball around middle and leg, turns it behind square leg from the back foot
fuller on middle and leg, played towards short leg
length ball on middle and leg, goes back and works it towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, driven towards mid-on for a quick single, the fielder was a bit deep and that allowed the single
fuller and flatter outside off, Vihari stays away from it
length ball around off, comes forward and turns it towards short fine leg
short of length outside off, coming in with the angle, Rahane dabs it between second slip and gully to bring up India's hundred
length ball outside off, Rahane watches it closely before leaving it alone
fuller on the stumps, full face of the bat from Rahane but straight towards mid-on
a touch fuller on the stumps, comes forward and drives it past the non-striker, Gabriel moves across swiftly to make the stop
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball around off, comes forward to defend, gets an inside edge towards square leg
fuller but down the leg side, left alone
short of length outside off, goes back and steers it behind point, beats the sweeper cover with ease
length ball outside off, a thick outside edge past first slip as the batsman plays for the spin but the ball holds its line
length ball around off, goes back and defends with a straight bat
fuller around off, whips it towards short midwicket who makes a partial stop and deflects the ball towards mid-on
a low full toss around off, comes forward and gently pushes it towards extra cover
short of length starting from outside off, and coming back in big with the angle, going past Vihari's face who does well to sway away
another lifter angling in, Vihari is one again up to it, drops his hands this time
fuller outside off, but far far away from the stumps, left alone
length ball on middle and leg, turned away towards square leg
a touch fuller but down the leg side, Vihari fails to connect the glance
another short one, angling towards the batsman, going over Vihari's left shoulder as he ducks under
length ball on middle and leg, turned away towards square leg
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it behind point for a couple
fuller around off, comes forward and defends

skips down the ground but doesn't reach to the pitch of the ball, still goes for the lofted shot. Cummins runs backwards from mid-on, covers good ground, gets his hands to it but cannot latch on in the end
fuller around off, comes forward and drives, short midwicket intercepts
length ball around middle and leg and spinning further down, Rahane looks to withdraw at the end but it brushes his gloves and just goes past Hope
short of length outside off, dabs it towards cover-point for one
short of length around off, stays back and defends it towards short leg, who has a shy at the stumps but Rahane was always inside his crease
length ball on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on
short outside off, Rahane stays back and pulls it towards deep square leg, in complete control there
length ball outside off, in the corridor, left alone
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it towards the bowler
length ball but down the leg side, Rahane ensures this time he is away from the ball
length ball around off, defended
length on middle and leg, turns it on the leg side for one
length ball around off, goes back and across and blocks
length ball around off, comes forward and works it towards forward short leg
was there some glove? Length ball, down the leg side, Vihari goes for the flick but misses. Not sure if there some bat or glove involved but Hope fails to collect
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards deep backward point
short of length outside off, lifting towards the batsman who works it behind square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards the left of mid-off
length ball around off, stays behind the line and blocks
length ball around off, turns it towards forward short leg who dives to his left to make a one-handed stop
short of length around off, pushes it towards extra cover off the back foot
full, on middle, and he drives with the turn to midwicket
swept furiously! Full, on his toes, and he uses Chase's turn to whip this fine past the keeper
extra bounce! Length ball outside off, but turning in with some added bounce off the deck. Too close to his body for the cut, but still manages to play behind square for a couple
length, outside off, and Vihari skips down the wicket to meet the ball. defended
whippy delivery, full on middle and turning in.Worked off his pads to the leg side
length ball on middle, and once again some extra bounce off the pitch. Vihari was squaring up to pull, but checks his shot after seeing that the ball was nearly throat-high
back of a length, just outside off, and he rocks back to block off the back foot
length ball outside off, and left alone completely. Through to Hope
full, just outside off, and he taps this back to the bowler
full, on off and he meets this under his eyes to drive. Firmly struck past the non-striker, but can't beat mid-on
full and wide outside off, and he drives along the ground through the covers. Man near the boundary, but he can't stop Rahane from getting his 18th half-century!
length ball, on middle, and fended away to cover
tossed up on middle, and whipped past short leg. Fielder in the deep though
length ball, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to nudge towards point
full, on leg stump, and nudged to the leg side
length ball, on off but skidding into Rahane. He rocks deep into his crease to block
full, on off stump. Blocked by Vihari
back of a length, just outside off, but firmly blocked off the back foot on this occasion
short of length into the rib cage, Vihari gets inside the line of the ball and works it past the keeper
another short one from Cummins, Rahane pulls it in front of the square, sprints back for the second
fuller around off, drives it to the right of the mid-on fielder, not from the middle of the bat but will get three
length ball around off, pushes it towards cover-point
length ball around off and middle, turns it towards short fine leg
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and flicks it towards midwicket for a couple
short and down the leg side, Rahane pounces on it, pulling it between the keeper and short fine leg for four
length ball around off, plays forward, defending and does well to keep it down
length ball around off, moves back and across a bit to turn it towards short fine leg
length ball on middle and leg, works it towards short fine leg once more
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
fuller around off, almost squaring the batsman up who pushes at it with hard hands, a thick outside edge goes into the ground and through the slip cordon
searing length ball outside off, coming in with the angle and moving away off the wicket to beat the forward push
another edge, goes over first slip this time, was a touch short but not much room as the ball came in after landing, Vihari cuts and cuts hard. A thick outside edge evades Bravo at first slip
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
length ball around middle and leg, defended towards short midwicket
short of length around off, goes back and cuts it towards deep extra cover, sweeper cover sprints to his right, gets his foot to stop the ball but it still rolls on to the boundary
overpitched this time, Rahane drives it towards mid-on
length around middle and leg, defended
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
pitched up on middle and leg, whips it towards long-on for one
short of length outside off, some extra bounce this time but Rahane does well to get on the top of it and cut it towards sweeper cover
length ball around off, defended from the front foot
length ball, just outside off, pushes it towards cover-point
fuller around off, comes forward and flicks it towards wide long-on, Holder puts in the chase and stops it just inside
length ball outside off, looks to steer it past slip but ends up deflecting it towards second slip, on the bounce
too full on the stumps and Vihari just punches it past mid-on for four, easy pickings there
short of length around off, stays on the back foot and drops it at his feet
starts with a length ball outside off, left alone
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it towards extra cover
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
length ball around off, Rahane stays back and blocks
short and wide outside off, Rahane pounces on it, cuts it hard to the right of the backward point fielder

beaten. Looked a bit causal there after an audacious shot last ball. Was a length ball around off, Rahane was walking into the shot, was nowhere near the pitch of it, pushes at it in the end and gets beaten
fuller around off and swinging in, Vihari was playing for the length, away from the body and gets beaten on the inside edge, Hope fails to take it neatly and concedes a bye
length ball outside off, left alone by Rahane
length ball around off, gets behind the line and defends down the ground
short of length outside off, but not too wide, Rahane still goes for the cut and gets beaten. An enquiry about caught-behind by the bowler but there was no bat involved
short of length outside off, Rahane watches it all the way into the keeper's gloves
short of length around off, stays back and works it towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, Rahane comes forward and flicks it towards the right of mid-on
short of length around off, Vihari was looking to work it on the leg side but the ball stops at him, ends up playing down the wicket
length outside off, stays beside the line and pushes it towards cover-point
fuller and wider, late movement for Roach but Vihari shows no interest

Roach provides the breakthrough, was a length ball outside off, moving away a little bit after pitching and taking the outside edge as Vihari gets squared off, trying to defend. Hope does well to dive forward and take neat low catch, the ball was dying on him
length ball outside off, Pant comes forward before leaving it alone
short of length outside off, Rahane stays back and defends
length ball but angling down the leg side
length ball, once again on the pads, flicked away towards fine leg
short of length around off and moving away after pitching. Pant was looking to play at it but gets beaten by movement and extra bounce
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
goes for the yorker but ends up bowling a low full toss on middle and leg, Pant guides it towards the wide long-on boundary to get off the mark
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
short of length outside off, steered past backward point for one
length ball but way outside off, Pant leaves it alone
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards mid-off
length ball outside off and coming in with the angle, Pant leaves it alone. Roach has his hand on his head but was a fair bit away from the off stump
fuller around middle and leg, clips it towards midwicket for a quick single
length ball around off, comes forward and looks to push it towards covers, the ball takes the outer half of the bat and goes towards gully
length ball angling towards middle and leg, Pant helps it towards square leg
short of length outside off and Pant chops it past the backward point fielder's left for his second boundary
length ball around middle and leg, defended towards short midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, defended once more
an attempted bouncer but down the leg side, Pant ducks instinctively
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
a touch fuller around off, another solid front-foot defence
fuller on the pads, clipped away towards fine leg, Rahane sprints back for the second and makes it safely
length ball around off, gets behind it and defends it towards mid-on
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks again
length ball around off, pushes it towards covers for a quick single
fuller around off, defends it towards mid-on from the crease
length ball in the corridor, Rahane leaves it alone
a touch fuller outside off, Rahane was rooted to the crease but manages to defend it at the last moment

chopped on! A big wicket for West Indies. Was a length ball outside off, Rahane looks to punch it off the back foot. The inward movement and the extra bounce means he could get only an inside edge that deflected on to the leg stump
fuller on the pads, clipped away towards fine leg to get off the mark
short of length angling across Pant, who drops it towards extra cover
fuller outside off, Jadeja comes forward and drives it towards cover
fuller around off, comes forward and straight-bats it towards mid-off
a touch shorter and wide outside off this time, left alone by Jadeja
fuller and wider outside off once more, another leave from Jadeja
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it right under his eyes

fuller around off and coming back in a bit to hit Jadeja on the pads, a loud appeal for lbw but Jadeja is signalling it hit his bat. Given out and the batsman immediately goes for a review. Replays confirm there was a big inside edge, Richard Kettleborough has to change his decision for the second time today
fuller and angling across Pant, who comes forward and looks to defend, a thick outside edge but lands well short of third slip
fuller, and wider outside off, left alone by Pant this time
fuller from Gabriel, Pant was moving across and looking to flick it away, misses and gets hit on the front pad. An appeal for lbw but this one pitched outside leg
length ball on the pads, flicked away nicely but cannot beat square leg
short of length and angling away, Pant was perhaps shaping for a pull but was late and adjusts to defend down the ground rather awkwardly
length ball but way outside off, left alone
fuller but around eighth stump, Jadeja doesn't bother
length ball, a bit closer to the stumps, but still not close enough to get Jadeja interested
pitched up on the stumps, Jadeja comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on
length ball around off, a big stride forward and blocked
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
short of length outside off, Pant lets it go through to Hope
fuller outside off, Pant leans into it and drives it through covers, two fielders chasing it but the ball wins in the end
pitched up outside off once again, comes forward and drives it towards mid-off
length ball swinging in to the batsman who comes forward and gets almost cramped. Manages to defend it on the leg side
length ball around off, defended from the front foot
fuller outside off and driven through extra cover, Gabriel puts in the chase and keeps it to two
full, from around the wicket. Tries to lift it over cover but slices it instead. Falls just beyond the fielder at cover
tossed up, wide enough for Pant to chase it, and he clobbers a drive over cover! Team 200 too
full, just outside off, and driven away from his body to wide long off
back of a length, on middle, and he tries to nudge it to the leg side
full outside off, and turning away. Driven to cover
full just outside off, and he reaches forward to block
length ball, outside off, and left alone by the batsman. The angle takes it through to Hope
this takes off! Length ball on middle, and angling away from Pant. He wants to defend at it from near his face, but the ball takes such a wild bounce that it flies past his glove instead
length ball, on leg stump, and fended with the bat's open face to cover
full, on off stump and angling away. Left alone once again
length ball on middle, and angling further away. He shoulders his arms
length ball, outside off, and turning away. Left alone
full outside off, and he reaches forward to tap towards point
length ball, on off and turning away. Defended away off the back foot
full on off stump, and Jadeja takes a huge stride forward to defend
full, on off, and he mistimes a straight drive to long on for one
full, just outside off, and he pushes at this - away from his body - to cover point
length ball, just outside off, and fended away from his body to point
nearly played on! Full, just outside off, and he attempts to defend. Ends up chopping it though
length ball, on middle, and blocked away
full, on middle stump, and Jadeja prods forward to defend towards cover
full, on middle, and defended
full, just outside off, and left alone once more
length ball, wide outside off and turning away. Left alone
length ball outside off, and he guides this away to point off the back foot
full, on off stump. Driven back to Chase
full, just outside off stump. Blocked back to the bowler
length ball, outside off, and left alone
length ball on the stumps, Pant goes back to cut but finds backward point
length ball on middle and leg, Jadeja defends it easily
length again but angling across this time, Jadeja was looking to cut it but gets beaten by the extra bounce
snorter, lifter, jaffa! Just short of length and leaving the batsman, Jadeja was looking to follow the ball but it swung away at the last moment to beat him. Wasn't far away from the gloves
a touch fuller this time but down the leg side
another short one, rising towards the batsman, Jadeja brings his hands up, almost taking his eyes off the ball but manages to keep it down
a touch fuller around, pushes it towards cover from the crease
starts with a fuller one outside off, Pant leans into it and finds the gap through covers, comes back for the second
fuller around off, comes forward again and works it towards mid-on, the bat turning in his hands at the point of contact
length ball outside off and moving away late, Pant leaves it alone
too full this time and Pant once again drives it through covers, slow outfield means it's two only
taken at second slip. Was a touch fuller once again, Pant pushes at it, gets a healthy outside edge and Holder makes no mistake. West Indies have struck early on day two
length ball around off and middle, Ishant defends it from the back foot
short of length and angling across the batsman, Jadeja does well to stay away from the line of the ball
short of length and Jadeja decides to go for the pull this time, doesn't time it well, only a single in front of square leg
short of length, in the rib cage, Ishant moves inside the line of the ball and works it towards fine leg
fuller and in the corridor, left alone by Jadeja
short of length but down the leg side, Jadeja lets it go once more
overstepping this time, Gabriel. Was fuller around fifth stump, Jadeja is trying not to chase them
length ball, pitching around leg and angling away from Jadeja, who doesn't bother attempting a shot. This means Roach will have potentially six balls at Ishant
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards short extra cover
length ball on middle and leg and tucked away towards square leg to get to the other end
length ball around off, pushes it towards cover from the back foot
a touch fuller but way outside off, left alone by Jadeja. Good carry to Hope though
length ball but on middle and leg this time, flicked away towards fine leg
this one keeps low but luckily wasn't aimed at the stumps. Bowled on a length outside off, Ishant was on the back foot and gets beaten as the ball stays low
goes for the yorker from around the wicket, Jadeja does well to jam his bat at it
length ball angling in, stays back and defends it on the leg side
fuller but on the pads, goes for the flick and misses. Collects a couple of leg byes
fuller around off and driven wide of mid-off, Jadeja comes back for the third given it's the fourth ball of the over
fuller around off, Ishant hops and moves across and works it behind square leg for a couple
short of length, rising towards the rib cage but Ishant gets on the top of it and dabs it towards leg slip/very short fine leg
fuller around off, pushes at it, not from the middle of the bat but enough on it beat the gully fielder and roll towards the third man boundary
fuller around off, pushes it towards cover-point and takes the single
fuller around off, Ishant moves across and pushes it towards mid-on
short of length around off, Ishant goes back and across and defends it towards covers
length ball around off, pushed towards mid-off from the back foot
a low full toss on the stumps, Ishant shuffles towards the off side and clips it in front of square for a couple
length ball angling across, Jadeja plays with an open bat-face and works it towards gully
short of length but down the leg side, Jadeja leaves it alone
fuller around off, steered towards sweeper cover for a couple
fuller but way down the leg side
fuller on the stumps, worked away towards midwicket to leave Ishant one ball to deal with
almost a yorker outside off but Ishant does well to jam his bat at it and find a gap between gully and slip for four welcome runs
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards midwicket, takes a single
length ball around off, looks to defend but gets a big inside edge on to the pads
short of length around off, some extra bounce for Cummins but Ishant does well to get behind and bunt it
fuller around off, comes forward and drives along the ground, cannot beat the cover fielder
short of length outside off and leaving away, Ishant was moving towards the off side and looking to defend, gets beaten
length ball around off, defended towards point from the back foot
length ball outside off, Jadeja stays back and pushes it towards gully

a touch fuller around off and middle, Jadeja was shuffling across, looks to flick but gets beaten, an appeal for lbw from Holder, given not out. Replays show it might have missed the leg stump. A leg bye to fine leg
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards short cover
length ball in the corridor, Ishant looks to defend but is late on it and gets beaten
length ball in the corridor, Ishant moves towards the off side before deciding to leave it alone
goes for the short one but the line is down the leg side, Ishant moves away from it comfortably
fuller around off, Jadeja comes forward and steers it towards cover
length ball in the corridor, left alone. It bounces once again before reaching the keeper
length ball outside off and angling across, Jadeja leaves it alone again
a touch fuller and way wider, once again shouldered arms, bounces just in front of the keeper the second time who does well to get his pads in front
length ball outside off, in the corridor, left alone
length ball around off, stays back and defends it on the off side
length ball outside off, defended towards point from the back foot
short of length outside off and coming back in with the seam, Ishant leaves it alone
a touch fuller around off, Ishant gets behind this and blocks
short of length down the leg side, Ishant misses the flick. Hope dives to his left to take it brilliantly, both hands
length ball outside off and moving away to beat the forward prod
length ball around off, defends it from the crease
length ball around off, pushes at it, gets an inside edge behind square leg
length ball around off, moves across and tucks it away towards backward square leg for one more
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards sweeper cover
length ball outside off, Ishant moves across and plays inside the line of it
length ball around off, hops across and dabs it towards square leg
length ball around off, looked like that kept a touch low, defended from the crease
lashed away. Holder around the wicket, short and very wide. Jadeja with the swing and the roundabout and the vigour. Gives deep cover no chance to his right
length outside off, blocked into the covers on the front foot
short ball dips in at his chest from outside off. Wants to play the pull but that's onto him too quick. Bunts it wide of mid-on
outside edge falls short of first slip. Short of a length and shaping away from the corridor. Gets on his toes and jabs at it. It dips on the Bravo. Perhaps Hope could have dived to his right at that
short of a length and wide outside off, hangs the bat inside the line and lets that go
length ball in the corridor, gets behind it and blocks into the covers
short of a length and into the body. Whipped uppishly with the angle to fine leg's right
beaten. Short of a length outside off and seaming away. Pushes at it well away from the body
length and just outside off, dropped into the covers with soft hands to steal the single
length and swinging in at off stump. Defended into the covers and sent back as he looks to steal a run
spanked away! Short ball at off stump. No sting on that. Sits up nicely and he swivels to hook into the turf and find the square leg boundary. Stylish, that
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
into the mid-riff. Short of a length and jumping into him as he tries to get behind the line and defend
just short of gully. Short and outside off. On his toes once again to try and defend this into the turf. Just a bit aerial towards gully
short and very wide outside off, left alone
short at off stump, shuffles and tucks this behind square leg off the back foot
bouncer from around the wicket. Starting on middle stump, going down leg. Left alone
length and curving into middle stump. Defended into the leg side. That came back in late, he got an angled bat on it
beaten. Short of a length and very wide outside off. Shuffles and jabs at another one away from the body
full and into the pads, flicked uppishly to fine leg's left
length and just outside off. Pokes at it and gets a thick outside edge to third slip
big appeal for lbw but Ishant has jumped outside the line of off like he always does. This jagged back in and past his back foot defence
length and nipping back in again. Nudged off the thick inside edge to fine leg
full and swung down the leg. Can't get bat on this flick
short and wide outside off, left alone
past the outside edge. Length ball just outside off, shuffles and defends close to the body, but far too much inside the line
chipped but safely into the vacant midwicket area. Short of a length and he's through the flick too early
short ball up at the hips, dropped into the midwicket region off the back foot
short and just outside off. Defended off the back foot, into the pitch
just short of square leg. Cramped at the chest again as he tries to pull. It's off the sticker and lands to the left of that lunging fielder
short of a length outside off, defended into the off side
length and tailing into the corridor, left alone
length outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
full and into middle stump. Plants the front leg across and flicks into the midwicket region where sloppy fielding has allowed a second. That's 50 between these two
short and very wide outside off, left alone
beaten. Short of a length and very wide. Ishant not looking to leave anything there today. Shuffles and swishes at it to be beaten
full and very wide outside off, left alone
lobs it up so delicately that not even short leg can get to this. Short and up in the corridor, gets behind the line and gently bunts it up. It lands inside the strip
bouncer and coming in at him. Sways back and lets that pass
full and wide outside off. Jams the bat down inside the line. Lets it go
past the bat again. Another yorker outside off, another jam into the pitch outside the line. West Indies with the half appeal for catch, but they won't review
tossed up full outside off, leans in and drives with the turn to long-off
beaten on the inside edge. Looks to flick as it turns past him. Nearly falls over

just gets bat on this! Nearly locked himself with a big shuffle across. It was a full toss and would have been an embarrassing lbw dismissal, but he gets the flick to deep square's right in the end. Gabriel the fielder there, is not afraid of showing his fury after sticking a boot out to stop this
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, solidly blocked on the front foot
full outside off, dead-batted on the front foot
nearly chops onto the stump. Length ball in the corridor. Looks to chop it through gully and gets an inside edge that bounces over off stump
length on leg stump, flicked to square leg's left and an early call that puts him in good position to come back for the second
short of a length just outside off, chopped into the vacant point region

now Gabriel gives work to fine leg. And he has no chance, just like wicketkeeper Hope. Short ball starts leg stump and keeps going down as Ishant leaps out of the way. Past Hope's dive, beats Roach's slide
flicks straight to backward square after jumping across off stump. We all want to be Smith. Full ball on off stump, but good connection

got him with a slower ball! Oh that's a soft way to go. Offcutter, yorker, outside off. That is well executed from Gabriel. Ishant picks it but it has thrown him off just enough for him to defend this onto the stumps off the inside edge
full outside off, leans in and drives with the turn to long-off

chips it back to the bowler. No resistance from Shami. Length ball is lobbed up at middle stump and he's tried to drive with hard hands. It comes off the inside half after turning and lobs straight back up. Chase has to jump into and Jadeja as he lunges to his right, and he does it with finesse
length on off stump, shuffles and defends to short leg
full on middle stump, watchfully blocked into the midwicket region
short of a length and spinning down leg side. Left alone
length on leg stump, spinning down again and left alone. Poor from Chase
short of a length just outside off, defended into the covers off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, defended to backward point off the back foot
inswinger tailing in from middle stump. Looks to flick but gets this off the outside part of the pad
slashed between third slip and gully. Short ball slanted across him, looks to roll his wrists on this and gets it right int he gap
right through Hope. Short ball slanted across him again. Looks for the cut and is beaten. It dips on the keeper who has moved too far to his left and isn't low as he does it. Just skips right past it
short of a length in the corridor, looks to drop it pitch side with soft hands, gets it to roll in the direction of first slip off the face of the bat
full outside off, jammed out towards mid-off
length on leg stump, defended to short leg off the back foot
length outside off, blocked into the turf
short of a length on leg stump, jabbed past leg slip off the back foot
full on middle stump, defended to midwicket
full toss outside off, tapped gratefully to mid-off
full and well outside off. Left alone
carts this wide of mid-off! Whew. No attempt to be subtle there. Full outswinger with a lot of width from around the wicket. Roach slower than Gabriel and there's more swinging. He takes it
full outswinger wide outside off, poked into the covers
beaten. Length ball shaping away outside off, jabs at it and can't connect
length and in at middle stump. Drops it to mid-on's left with soft hands and steals the run
nicely defended. Inswinger tailing in towards off. Gets forward and in front of his body, but he survives again
length outside off, blocked on the front foot

short of a length outside off, gets down for the paddle sweep, shapes to change after it's too short. But it's slow enough that he can recover and still get the ball fine. Two more as deep backward square cleans up to his left
short and into the body. Shoveled out to deep midwicket off the back foot

fifty! Cramp or not, the sword is always out. Short and wide outside off, backs away and slaps it to sweeper cover's right to give him no chance. Top knock from Jadeja, his 11th fifty in Tests and one of the more difficult ones

there it is! The big Jadeja hoick over midwicket. He's not a batsman who rates spinners very much. This is tossed up outside off, he gets his weight onto the front foot and creams it, flat, into the stands
full and into middle stump. Can only find midwicket with this flick

handsomely past mid-off! Jadeja pushes him to take three as soon as that has pinged off the bat. And they get it. Length ball just outside off, slanting in. Front foot goes into the leg side but bat into the off. It does the job though. Probably his second most iconic batting moment, after that first-ball six he hit earlier this year
full outside off, pushed out to long-off on the front foot
short and down leg side, gets out of the way and lets it go
length and shaping away from the corridor. Squares him up and forces him to defend into the covers
length at middle stump, tucked into the leg side off the back foot
beaten. Short and very wide outside off. Has a massive heave at this but isn't close to getting that
full and down leg side. No need to chase that
length on middle stump, defended to mid-on with a half stride
length outside off, leans in and flicks to fine leg

taken by Hope. Fifth catch for the stand-in keeper. Short ball climbing in the corridor. Behind this to try and play the hook, but that gets very steep on him. He ends up slicing it behind the stumps and Hope takes a few steps back to hold onto that
starts with an inswinger drifting on to the thigh, Brathwaite collects a leg bye to fine leg
length ball around off, coming a bit slower off the wicket, defended tentatively by Campbell
straying on the pads and flicked away nicely in front of square leg to get off the mark with a boundary
fuller and wider outside off this time, Campbell throws his bat at it, wasn't to the pitch of the ball and hence it went in the air, just evading a diving Jadeja to his left
short of length and coming in off the seam this time to beat the bat, struck on the thigh but too high
starts with a length ball in the corridor, moving away from the batsman, left alone
fuller and on the pads this time, flicked away towards deep square leg
length ball on the pads, goes for the flick but misses
length ball, once again on the pads, Campbell goes for the flick but misses and is struck on the thigh guard
length ball slanting across this time, Campbell leaves it alone
length ball, shaping away from the left-hander, defended towards cover-point
length ball around off, Brathwaite turns it on the leg side but a brilliant stop by Vihari at short leg
fuller outside off, inviting the drive, Brathwaite goes for it but gets beaten as the ball just moves away. Pant had to collect it near head height, and he fumbles. Not that there was an edge
fuller and swinging in to the pads, Brathwaite flicks it towards fine leg for one
length ball outside off, pushes at it, a thick outside goes through the slip cordon. He is living dangerously here
a touch fuller outside off this time and Campbell frees his arms, goes over wide mid-off and collects four more
length ball around off, comes forward and offers a solid defence
fuller outside off, around fifth stump and swinging away big, left alone by Brathwaite
length ball, a bit closer to the batsman who comes forward and defends
length ball around off, Brathwaite was half forward, defends it towards point
fuller on the pads, flicked away uppishly towards deep square leg, Ishant puts in the chase from fine leg and stops it just inside
short of length but down the leg side, Campbell fails to take advantage and gets hit on the thigh
short this time but way down the leg side, miles away from the batsman, Pant does well to reach there and collect
fuller on the pads and swinging in, flicked behind square leg for one
length ball outside off, left alone by Campbell
length ball around middle, Campbell looks to play across his pads, the ball takes the outer half and rolls towards point
short of length on middle and leg, a half pull by Campbell but there is a not-so-deep square leg in place
fuller and down the leg side, trying to bring that leg slip/gully in place, Brathwaite fails to connect
length ball outside off, good bounce there for Ishant but left alone by the batsman
length ball around middle and leg, defended back towards the bowler
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it down the ground
a touch fuller but down the leg side, Campbell fails to put that away and gets hit on the pad
fuller and in the corridor this time, left alone by Campbell, bounces once more before reaching Pant
length but down the leg side and swinging further down, Campbell had no chance to connect
length ball in the corridor, and slanting across, left alone by Campbell
length ball around off, stays on the back foot and pushes it towards the left of mid-off
length ball outside off and Campbell decides to go aerial. Wasn't to the pitch of the ball but let his arms extended, didn't middle but gets it over the cover fielder
length ball outside off in the corridor, left alone

length ball around off, was looking to play initially before trying to leave, the ball hits the inner half and dribbles towards the bowler who underarms it casually to hit the stumps at the striker's end. Campbell was home

short of length and pulled towards square leg, a direct hit at the bowler's end from Jadeja but the batsman was home. They are looking to steal an overthrow but Brathwaite sends him back as the ball didn't go too far. The fielder throws it to Shami who standing at the stumps but fails to collect and West Indies eventually get an overthrow
a bit of Steven Smith in that leave, length ball in the corridor, left alone by Campbell
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it through covers for four
length ball outside off and swinging away, Brathwaite was following the ball before withdrawing his bat at the last moment
length ball outside off, once again a bit of shape away, a more confident leave this time
length ball around off, tucked away towards midwicket for a single
fuller on the pads, goes for the flick but misses, the ball brushes the pads on its way to Pant
Shami strikes in his first over, with a searing yorker just outside off. Campbell looks get his bat down, gets an inside edge that ricochets into the leg stump
fuller outside off, Brathwaite pushes at it, gets a thick outside edge but lands short of gully
length ball outside off and swinging in, left alone by Brathwaite
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards short extra cover
length ball around off, moves across and turns it on the leg side
a short one from Bumrah and Brathwaite gets under it easily
length ball outside off, pushes it towards covers off the back foot
length ball around off, pushes it towards off side
length outside off, left alone but the batsman
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends it towards covers
a touch fuller around off, 89mph, defends from the crease
length ball around fourth stump, defended back towards the bowler
length ball around off, stays back and taps it towards short midwicket
fuller at the stumps, almost a yorker, Brooks does well to keep it out, his first delivery in Test cricket
pitched up around off, comes forward and defends it solidly, right from the middle of the bat
short of length outside off, Brooks drops his hands to let it go through
fuller around off, defended back towards the bowler with the full face of the bat
a bouncer this time but banged in too short. Brooks ducks under it with a periscope bat
another short one but once again sails over the batsman who ducks under
fuller around the off stump, comes forward and drives it towards mid-on
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends
length ball around off, 139kph, hits high on the bat as Brathwaite looks to defend, the bottom hand comes off
length ball around off and middle, tucked away towards square leg where Vihari dives to his right to make the stop
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
length ball around off, keeps a bit low, tucked away towards square leg. Third successive maiden
length ball around off and coming back in with the angle, tapped towards the leg side
length ball in the corridor and swinging in, left alone by Brooks
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and defends
length ball outside off and coming in with the angle, left alone once again
goes for the yorker, Brooks was moving towards the off side but gets his bat down in time and keeps it out
short of length and jumping at the batsman, surprises Brooks who was looking to defend it from the back foot, gets hit on the glove. Bumrah has overstepped though

lobs in the air but away from short leg. Another short one, Brooks was almost fending at it, takes the bottom hand off as the ball lobs to the right of the short leg fielder, well away from the fielder
defends this length ball around off from the crease
length again, pushes it on the off side
a touch fuller and tailing in a bit, mistimes the drive down the wicket
length ball around off, blocked from the crease
a touch fuller on the stumps, tucked away towards short leg
length ball around off, closes the face of the bat to work it towards square leg
short ball up at the right shoulder. Well directed, but also watched closely as he lets it go
short of a length on off stump, defended solidly on the back foot
length outside off, shuffles and whips it through midwicket off the back foot
short ball. Off stump line, much shorter than the previous bouncer. Easier to duck under this
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length wide outside off, left alone
short of a length and rising in the corridor, left alone
length and just outside off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length on leg stump, defended towards square leg off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, left alone. Barely carries to Pant
beaten. This jumps away from the outside edge, but far too much. Length ball outside off, shuffles and hangs the bat out
shot! Flair from the debutant. This is full and onto leg stump. Ishant's bowled a few of these today. A nice big flourish as he flicks this aerially, but strongly, in front of square leg
length and in at leg stump, gets deep in the record and flicks to long leg
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length and into the pads. Gets deep in the crease and tickles this fine
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
past the outside edge but he withdrawing the bat in the end. Length and slight turn away outside off
full outside off, dead-batted on the front foot
length ball wobbling in the corridor, left alone
length outside off, leans in and pushes with hard hands. Bobs back towards the bowler
length and just outside off. Defended off the back foot
length and just outside off, defended off the back foot

taken in his follow through! Lovely reflex catch from Ishant as Brathwaite drills one back to him looking to play the straight drive. It's a length ball just outside off, and like the second ball of the over, he's gone at it with hard hands. Got more power through this as it was a full-blooded drive, but that just means it goes at catching height for Ishant who hangs on in front of his knees, takes a few inelegant steps as he loses balance, but holds on
past the edge. Short of a length across off stump, hangs the bat inside the line and can't get bat on it
full and just outside off, driven on the bounce to extra cover. Bravo was taking a walk at the non-striker's end and had to get back in quickly
short of a length outside off, backs away and cuts through cover
length outside off, punched to cover off the back foot
tossed up at off stump, blocked on the front foot
full outside off, driven with the turn to extra cover
length and just outside off, defended off the back foot
bouncer at a leg stump line, ducks under it to let it go
short of a length in the channel, left alone as it gets steep
short of a length in the corridor, wants to play, changes his mind late and just gets tangled as he lets this go
length and just outside off, jumps up as he gets behind the line to defend
length outside off, left alone
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot
full at off stump, pushed down the pitch with soft hands

lobs up for first slip off Pant's leg and Rahane holds onto a simple catch. Looks like an arm ball from Jadeja, in the corridor. He backs away and looks to cut. it's onto him too quickly, he gets an outside edge that's too rapid for the keeper. Balloons harmlessly to Rahane's right though and that's the innings
through everyone! Another arm ball, but this one is at a good length and drawing the batsman forward. Chase defended for the one that turns away, but this climbs over middle and past Pant's hip
full outside off, driven with the turn to mid-off
full and just outside off, driven into silly point's shin pad
beaten. Length outside off and straightening off the pitch as he pushes on the front foot
oh neatly drive. Length and angled into the corridor. Leans in and drives on the rise to beat mid-off to his right
length and into the pads, clipped down to fine leg with the angle
short of a length and cutting into the body as he looks to flick
length and in at leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the inside half
length and shaping in late. Defended on the front foot
full and just outside off. Jammed to backward point off the outside half of the bat
full outside off, defended down the pitch
short of a length outside off, onto the back foot to punch to cover
full on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
length outside off, dead-batted on the front foot
short of a length just outside off, left alone
a bouncer outside off, Chase stays away from the line
short of length once again, this time at the batsman, Chase gets on his toes and defends
length ball around off, comes forward and offers a solid defence
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends it down the ground
pitched up a bit this time, just outside off, Chase leans into the drive and sends it through extra cover for four, off the mark with a boundary
length ball around off, comes half forward and defends
full on middle stump, jammed down to mid-on
length outside off, gets deep in the crease and defends as it turns in
flies past slip. The kind of edge Brooks would have preferred, but still not the shot Bravo wanted to play. Another quicker one, short of a length and he's late on the cut. This fizzes past Rahane

shut up and take my money! Darren Bravo. Wow. Full and pushed through flat at an off stump line. He just plants half a stride down, brings a nice big batswing down and launches this with the turn over the long-on boundary. With the back leg raised. Immense beauty.
length on middle stump, clips with the turn through square leg
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's left. He dives but can't hold on cleanly. They sneak a run
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
length and just outside off, blocked into the covers on the front foot
short of a length just outside off, allows that to come on and punches late on the up. Runs through point
length and just outside off. Defends inside the line and gets a thick edge to roll towards the slips
length and into the corridor. Defended to point
short of a length outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
yorker kept out. Speared in at off stump, but well watched
short of a length outside off. Looks for the cut but is too eager and loses his timing. It trickles to point's right off the inside half
length at off stump. Opens the face and runs it to backward point. Hesistation but Chase calls through for the run in the end
short and in at the body. Gets off the floor and defends it into the pitch
bouncer in the corridor, sways away to let it go

length on leg stump, dabbed to square leg's left. It's Jadeja there and he rarely lets you off the hook if you hesitate. Which they do. Swoops down and nearly takes the stumps down at the striker's end
short of a length just outside off, jumps up from a length. Left alone
length and in at off stump. Tapped back down the pitch on the front foot
length ball slanted down leg side. Can't connect with the flick
looks for the big cover drive, but this ends up at mid-on off the thick inside edge. Length ball outside off and he was driving away form the body. Not the pitch for that shot
length outside off, watchfully pushes to point with soft hands
length ball around off, looks to drive on the off side, inside edge takes the ball towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, pushed on the leg side
length again, turns it towards short leg
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover for a couple
fuller around off, pushed back towards the bowler from the front foot
pitched up and driven through the covers, Vihari cannot cut it off this time

traps him lbw but Bravo goes for a review. Was a length ball, Bravo shuffled across but missed the flick and got hit in front of middle as the ball came in with the angle. A loud appeal from Bumrah and up goes the finger. Replays confirm the ball would have gone on to hit the middle and leg. West Indies lose the review
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length ball around off, Hope defends with soft hands and it almost rolls back on to the stumps, but Hope is aware and kicks it away
length ball in the corridor, left alone
short of length outside off, defended towards cover-point off the back foot
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
slower in the air, a touch fuller around off, defended from the front foot
once again in the batsman's half and Chase frees his arms this time, lofts it over the bowler's head for a six
pushed through this time, looks to defend on the front foot, the ball takes the inner half and rolls on the leg side
pushes this length ball towards short midwicket from the back foot
length around off, defends it from the back foot
fired in around off stump, blocked by Chase from the crease
length ball in the corridor, left alone
goes for the bouncer, angling in towards the batsman, doesn't bounce much but Hope manages to get under it in time
a touch fuller around off, drives it square of the wicket on the off side and gets off the mark with a couple
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length ball around off, stays back and defends it towards short midwicket
length ball in the corridor, shouldered arms
length ball around off, punched towards covers off the back foot
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
length ball around off, a bit of spin away from Hope who defends it from the back foot, soft hands
fuller around off, driven but straight towards extra cover
almost gets through, length ball around off, an arm ball it looked like, almost sneaks in through the defences, an inside edge on to the body
fuller outside off, drives it towards covers
length ball around off, comes half forward and defends it towards the leg side
short of length outside off, some room too and Chase throws his bat at it, a thick outside edge flies past third slip
a bouncer in response, aimed at the batsman but not enough venom in it, Chase ducks under quite comfortably
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends on the leg side
short again but too high this time, Chase ducks under it easily
length ball outside off, just opens the face of the bat to place it behind point, Jadeja puts in the chase to keep it to three

length ball angled in, goes back and punches it towards short leg, hitting Agarwal on the collar bone. He's in some discomfort, the physio is out, tending to him. And he looks fine. Meanwhile, Kohli is sharing a laugh with the umpires
length ball around off, pushes it through, Chase looks to defend on the front foot, gets an inside edge on to the pads
fuller around off, pushes it back towards the bowler
short and wide, gets some turn and bounce, Chase was looking to cut it away but gets beaten
angling in on to the stumps, gets an inside edge that rolls towards short leg
angling on to the pads this time, Chase misses the flick and gets rapped on the thigh
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
jaffa, moving away after landing on a length outside off, Hope was looking to follow the line, ends up pushing at it and gets beaten
length ball, coming back in with the angle, tapped behind square leg
length ball around off, moves across and works it towards midwicket
a short one around off, Hope just sways away from the line
goes for the two-ball trick, a short one followed by an almost yorker around off stump, Hope is once again up to it, jams his bat at it and keeps it out
short of length outside off, punched towards sweeper cover off the back foot
another arm ball, pitched on a length outside off and goes between bat and pad, just over the off stump. Looked like Pant missed the stumping there as he fails to collect the ball cleanly
a touch fuller this time, comes forward and smothers it
fuller again, whipped towards the cover fielder
pitched up around off, drives it towards mid-off from the front foot
length ball, angling in on to the stumps, defends from the front foot
looks for the yorker but Chase digs it out back towards the bowler
short of length outside off, punched towards covers from the back foot
length ball around off, defended from the crease
back of length outside off, punched towards the left of the cover fielder for a quick single
length ball around off, comes forward and displays copybook front-foot defence
a bouncer, pitching around off and swinging away, Hope goes down and sway away
length ball around off, Chase goes back and pulls it uppishly but well away from the midwicket fielder, gets a boundary
short of length outside off, a bit of turn there for Jadeja, goes back and cuts it towards deep extra cover
slower length ball around off, comes forward and defends
pushed through around off stump, drives it towards mid-off
length ball on middle and leg, turned away towards backward square leg
short of length outside off, punches it towards deep extra cover for one
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length ball around off, coming in with the angle, left alone
short of length outside off, rises on his toes and steers it towards deep point
a bouncer from Shami this time, looks like that's the plan to Hope who so far has ducked under without any discomfort, and does the same this time around as well
pitched up around off and driven beautifully to the left of the mid-off fielder, full face of the bat, high elbow, perfect balance. Picturesque in one word
length ball around off, looks to defend from the crease, gets an inside edge on to the pads
fuller outside off, driven square off the wicket, Vihari cuts it off and fires in the throw to the keeper but Chase is quick enough to make his ground
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards sweeper cover
fuller on the middle and leg, comes forward and blocks
short and wide outside off, rocks back and cuts it towards deep point, Vihari chases it to keep it to two
length ball around off, defends it from the front foot
fuller around off, driven from the front foot but finds Kohli at extra cover
length ball around off, stays back and punches it back towards the bowler
fuller around off, Chase comes forward and drives it through covers, opening the face of the bat, Jadeja with the chase but even he cannot stop it
length ball around off, defended from the crease

keeps quite low, was a length ball around off, Chase was stuck in the crease, tries to bring his bat down but the ball sneaks underneath, on the volley to Pant who looks in mild discomfort, looks like hurt his hand a bit
fuller around off and angling in, stays in the crease and pushes down the ground
an inside edge past the stumps. Length ball outside off, Chase's bat comes down at angle, an inside edge to fine leg
length ball around off, defended from the crease

a brilliant catch by Rahul at square leg. Was a length ball on the pads, Chase goes for the flick but cannot keep it down and Rahul takes a nice catch to his right. Ishant provides a breakthrough straightaway, looked like it was a plan by his reaction. Wait, we are checking for the no-ball and looks like Ishant has got a molecule an atom of his shoe behind the line. Chase is livid with himself
short one around off, Hetmyer was looking to come forward, almost fends at it in the end but gets off the mark with a single towards square leg
length ball around off, stays back and defends it on the leg side
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks right under his nose
length ball in the corridor, left alone by the batsman, it swings in after passing the stumps
fuller outside off, Hetmyer drives it through covers for a couple
length ball outside off and coming in with the angle, Hetmyer looks to punch at it and gets beaten
length ball around off, punched towards mid-off from the back foot
short one outside off and Hetmyer goes for a pull, was in the air but well away from Jadeja who puts in the chase and pulls it just inside
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
length ball around off, Hetmyer was looking to turn it on the leg side, gets a leading edge towards covers
length ball around off, defends it from the crease
fuller but down the leg side this time
length ball around off, Hetmyer gets behind this and defends with soft hands
a touch fuller around off, blocked again
beats the outside edge, was a length ball outside off, Hetmyer looks to play at it and gets beaten
angling on to the pads, flicked away towards midwicket, was looking for the second but has to settle with one
length and angled in at off stump. Blocked on the front foot
falls short of second slip. Length outside off, pushes away from the body. Not much has carried from that length today.
short of third slip this time. Short of a length and once again he's pushing at this away from the body. Inside the line. Bursts through Kohli's grasp low to his right
length just outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, drives on the up into the covers. Not particularly well. That stuck in the pitch
well controlled hook out to deep square. Short ball up at his head but he managed to keep it down
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length at leg stump, leans in and dabs it fine of DBS
length on off, blocked on the front foot
full at off stump, tapped back to the bowler off the front foot
chipped without meaning too. Looked to drill this through the cover from outside off, but wasn't to the pitch of the ball. It rolls down to long-on
full on middle stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and in at leg stump. Tapped to mid-on's left off the back foot
nicely controlled. Short of a length outside off, allows it to come on and dabs it to backward point's left. Ishant there running after it
oh sweetly driven. Length ball outside off and he gets nice big stride, high elbow and drives on the rise to mid-off's left. Not easy to play that shot on this pitch
low full toss at leg stump. Attempted yorker not quite landing. Stabbed into the midwicket region
