more class from Hope. So composed as he plays right under his eyes. This is full and in at the stumps and he gently taps it between non-striker and stumps
short of a length outside off, left alone
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
sliced wide of mid-off without too much control. Length ball pushed across off stump. He steps out hurriedly and just manages to open the face after failing to get to the pitch of this
lobbed up slowly at a length on leg stump. Defended to short leg
short of a length on leg stump, dabbed down to DBS off the back foot
length outside off, stretches a long way out and drives to extra cover
full and into leg stump. Nudged past short leg with soft hands
short of a length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
Jadeja with a big dive to his left at backward point. Short and wide, cut firmly, but no runs for it
full toss at off stump, punched to deep mid-off
oh nearly outfoxes himself, does Hope. Short of a length ball skidding on outside off. He shuffles, thinks of a poke at it, thinks of a leave, then a poke again. And in the end is beaten
length and turning in at middle stump. Punched to midwicket off the back foot
length ball skidding straight on. Shapes to punch the one that turns in. This doesn't, forcing him to have a swish at this. Gets it to mid-off
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
short of a length outside off, backs away and cuts to point's left
full on off stump, driven with the turn to mid-off. Risky single completed
full and drifting away late outside off. Wants to flick but that drift means he mistimes it
full outside off, driven to long-on
93kph full toss at middle stump. Punched back down the pitch. Jadeja lunges but can only parry it out to long-on
length and skidding on, very wide outside off. Left alone
cuts aerially at this short ball, wide outside off. Out to sweeper cover's left

dribbles past leg stump off the inside edge! Oh Hetmyer too struggling with Vihari's skidders. Length ball at off, he gets on the back foot and jabs for one that turns. Bit of a miracle this hasn't snuck onto the stumps. Ishant wit a nice effort to pull this back in inches from the fine leg boundary
length and skidding away outside off. Left alone
short of a length just outside off, shuffles hurriedly and defended from inside the line on the back foot
dropped short at off stump. Pulled out to deep square. Mistimed
full on leg stump, blocked down the pitch
full on leg stump, driven with the angle down to long-on
full on leg stump, nudged through square leg off the front foot
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
inside edge to short leg as he goes wide of the crease. Looking to block on the front foot but this skids on
length on off stump, blocked down the pitch
length on leg stump, tickles the thigh guard and through to the keeper as he looks to flick
length at off stump, blocked down the pitch
short of a length just outside off, tapped to mid-off on the up
short and into the hips. Uses the angle to shovel this down to fine leg
short of a length in the corridor, left alone

got him! If it carried to Pant, that is. Soft signal is out. Superb delivery from Ishant. Slanted in at middle stump at a good length and straightening after forcing him to play. It's a scrambled seam, but this ball has cut away some distance. Hope can't do more than get an edge as he defends this. And Pant has lunged to his right and forward to get his gloves under this. That will be out. Top class from India's most experienced bowler
length and in at middle stump, tucked to midwicket off the back foot
length outside off, defended out to deep backward point
length in the corridor, left alone. Some late shape inwards
length and in at leg stump, punched to mid-on on the rise
length and wobbling outside off. Left alone
short of a length and skidding through in the corridor. Left alone
neatly done. Short of a length and pushed across off stump. Waits on it, opens the face, gets it expertly to the third man boundary
past the edge. Ishant asks him to try the same shot again. Hetmyer does. This one rose up from a length through

oh he's taken another return catch! This one has taken some effort because it's dipping and right down by his ankle. So he's had to get his hands right down from way up in the clouds where they normally are. Length outside off, Hetmyer wants to drive on the up. As many batsmen have found in this Test, that is not easy on the pitch. Comes off the high part of the bat and loops at the bowler, who has done fantastically to hold on. What a day Ishant has had. Just all-round brilliance from him today. Tumbles as he holds on to this
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, nicely behind the line to defend down the pitch

taken at second slip! A five-for for Ishant! Ninth in Tests. Just hangs a full ball outside off. Roach jabs away from the body with an open face and guides it straight to Kohli. That's loose and Holder is visibly displeased
length and in at off stump. Defended solidly on the back foot
offcutter at a driving length. Holder is not going to drive with ten minutes remaining. Just taps it back to the bowler
full and tailing in late to the corridor. Driven to mid-off
deft from Holder. Length ball in the corridor, allows it to come in close. Opens the face and runs it past second slip
shot! Wow that is some timing. Length ball angled in at off stump. Gets deep in the crease and whips it through midwicket with the angle
length and in at leg stump. Flicked to square leg's left off the back foot
beats the edge. Gets it to straighten from a length and move away as he defends on the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked out to deep square

dropped! Vihari was hesitant all along running in from deep backward point. Kohli was also headed for this from second slip. A dive to the right in the end and can't even get his hands on this. Holder was looking to launch that over midwicket, but it straightened off a length and took the top edge. Ishant gives Vihari the eyes and the voice. And the vocabulary
short of a length outside off. Left alone
another leading edge as Holder closes the face on this. Length on middle stump, through the flick too early but safely to mid-off's left
length and pushed across off. Left alone
short of a length on leg stump, shuffles and deflects this down to fine leg off the body
length outside off, left alone
offcutter outside off. Way too short. Left alone
full at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, defended off the back foot
offcutter but well watched. Dips at a length on off stump. He dead-bats it on the front foot
hits him in the box first up. Short of a length ball nips back in and past the inside edge as he gets back to defend this
short of a length and slanted across off stump, left alone
short of a length and cutting into the corridor. Holds the bat inside the line to let it go
full outside off, bat inside the line again as he lets this go
length at off stump, defended down the pitch off the front foot
length at off stump, solidly blocked on the front foot
length and in at off stump, blocked on the front foot
full at middle stump, drive on the up to mid-on
crisply driven through the off side. Length ball wide outside off, reaches out and drives on the up into the vacant cover region
short of a length outside off, stays inside the line and guides this out to deep point with an open face
attempted yorker, slides down leg side. Can't get bat on that
length outside off, solidly defended on the front foot
beats the outside edge. Climbs up from a length and straightens past the bat as he looks to defend
short of a length on leg stump, tickled to fine leg. Refuses the single
falls short of Pant. Length and straightening again. Gets the edge this time but he's defended with soft hands and it falls well short to the keeper's right
short of a length outside off, punched to backward point's right
ducks under this. Well done in the end by Cummins. This is headed for his ribs but he dips into the off side
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, swishes and gets a thick edge down to third man
oh what a shot. For no run. Length ball outside off, skids on nicely and he punches on the up to mid-on
length outside off, driven on the rise into the covers
full outside off, sweetly driven again, but straight to extra cover
four at third man. Another pristine shot from Holder. Length outside off, allows it to come on and opens the face late to expertly run this wide of second slip
short and very wide outside off. And it is called so
finds the boundary again. Quality batting from Holder all over. This is overpitched outside off and once again he opens the face at just the perfect time to find the square boundary on the off side
length across off stump, left alone
full and wide outside off, left alone
full and wide outside off, left alone gratefully
length and wide outside off, bat inside the line, ball well away from it before going through to the keeper
oh nicely bowled. Dips into the corridor and forces him to defend at it. But it narrowly evades the outside edge
past the inside edge this time. Length ball slanted in. Cummins falls over into the off side as he tries to defend on the front foot. But he's made it through another over
length ball in at off stump, blocked on the front foot
overpitched outside off, driven on the front foot to mid-off
length at off stump, flicked on the rise to mid-on

shot! Gosh he's looked so good this morning. Those wrists have been working perfectly and he finally uses them to get one over mid-on, who he's kept finding. This is short of a length outside off, angling into him and he uses that angle to just chip it over and wide of the fielder
drags this wide of mid-on with a filthy hoick moments after all the praise. Bumrah's doing though, he's bowled the slower yorker and Holder's lost shape. Gets it off the inside half
short of first slip. Length outside off, soft hands on the forward block
length outside off, tucks it to midwicket's left, can't get the single
length in the corridor, dead-batted on the front foot
full outside off, shapes to drive but withdraws the bat late
bouncer slanted in at off stump, comfortably ducked
past the edge. Length and just outside off. Angled in but once again, manages to evade the edge on the block

and again. Misses outside edge as well as off stump. Cummins will be happy to keep defending to cover off stump as long as the ball is missing the outside edge. Not a bad strategy, either. Even the likelihood of an edge carrying isn't high
yorker outside off, left alone
full and into the pads. Flicks and calls two immediately, but he's timed that too well. Deep mdwicket onto it quickly to his left
beaten. A productive shot, this hanging inside the line. Length ball spins in but is still not hitting bat
length and skidding on wide outside off, left alone
beats the edge. Length and straight through in the corridor as he defends
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
full outside off, has a jab at it but it skids through rapidly to beat him
length on leg stump, shoveled down to fine leg

big appeal for lbw. Not given. The line looked very good. Is that high? An incoming ball rapping his back pad in front of middle. India have reviewed. There's no edge on it. It's past the inside edge as he tries to drive on the up...it's umpire's call on the impact! Whew. That was close.
jumps fast the outside edge. Fire from Shami. Slams this into a length with the angle in and then straightens it
length on middle stump, flicked to mid-on
short of a length and into the thigh. Raps him on the front thigh guard
pulled wide of mid-on. Short of a length outside off, mistimes the pull. it's uppish, but it's wide of the fielder and has enough on it to trickle into the boundary
length and wide outside off, left alone
slows it down. Length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
full and flat, off stump. Dead-batted down the pitch
past the outside edge. This skids on from a length and past his bat
length and wide outside off, defends close the pad, ball skids past
another ball skidding away quickly from the corridor. Past the outside edge as he defends
length ball wide outside off, driven off the toe-end to extra cover
past the edge. Angled in, moving out. Holder looked to defend that
length at off stump, dabbed into the off side with soft hands and they take the run
length and curving in. Very wide outside off. Left alone
full and wobbling wide outside off. Left alone
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length at off stump, dead-batted on the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked to long leg's left and they steal the second
length on middle stump, defended off the inside edge
length on middle stump, driven to long-on with the angle
length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
full, on middle stump, and driven past the non-striker to mid-on
full, on off stump, and swinging into his pads. Again driven with the straight bat to short midwicket
full, on off stump, and Holder prods forward to defend with soft hands
full, just outside off, and tapped with the bat's open face down to third man

the umpire raises his finger! But Cummins reviews. Full, just outside off, and he presses forward to block. Ball went past his outside edge, but when it did, there was a definite noise. Now was that bat hitting the ground or bat hitting the ball? Replay shows there's clear daylight between bat and ball. It was actually hitting the ground. Umpire reverses his decision
back of a length, outside leg stump, and Cummins ducks under it
full, just outside off, and he defends with soft hands
full just outside off stump, and he meets the ball on the front foot. Defended
tossed up, full on off, and drilled back to Jadeja
full, on off, and he brings the bat down to drive past the non-striker. Stopped at long-on
full just outside off, and angling away from Cummins. He hangs his bat outside off but no contact with the ball
full, just outside off, and skidding into the keeper's gloves

edged and taken! And this is the big wicket of Holder. Length ball outside off, and Holder goes fishing with his bat. But he's too slow to push at it, and it finds the edge of his bat. Pant makes no mistake, and India need just one more wicket to wrap up the WI innings

appeal for lbw but not given. This was full on middle stump, and he misses the leg-side clip. Hits the front leg and Shami asks Kohi to review but this is going down leg stump. Given not out once again. India lose a review
length ball, just outside off, and he bunts this past Shami to mid-off
length ball angling into his pads, and flicked to deep midwicket for one
full, just outside off from around the wicket. Cummins fails to get any connection, and the ball goes to Pant on the bounce
back of a length on off, takes a bit of extra bounce. Gabriel manages to work it towards the leg side for one
full, on off, and he goes for a wild slog over the leg side. But Jadeja has skidded this through, and the batsman's off-stump is knocked back. West Indies all out for 222
back of a length, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to defend
length ball, wide outside off, and nudged into the gap near point
back of a length, outside off, and through to Hope
length ball, on middle, and nudged off his hips to midwicket. Enough time to jog back for the second run
length ball, just outside off, and he rocks back to fend
full, just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to block

falls just short of first slip! Length ball outside off, and Mayank gets an edge trying to defend off the back foot. Ball bounces under the slip-fielder's hands and then runs into the third-man fence. Gabriel gives the fielder an earful!
length ball, on off and angling in. Clipped to the leg side
back of a length, just outside off, and punched with the bat's open face. Beats point
back of a length, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to block
back of a length, just outside off, and blocked off the back foot
length ball, just outside off, and fended off the back foot once again
full, on off, and driven back to Roach
full, on middle, and clipped fine past the keeper's left to fine leg
full just outside off, and he prods forward to check-drive. Finds cover
full, on middle, and blocked with the straight bat
full, just outside off, and driven down the ground to mid-off
full just outside off, nice channel outside the stumps, and Rahul prods forward to defend. Ball jags slightly away and very nearly takes his outside edge!
length ball, just outside off, and left alone
length ball, on middle, and defended off the back foot
full, on off stump, and swerving into his pads. Clipped, but finds midwicket
back of a length, just outside off, and fended away to cover
back of a length, just outside off, and he sways away from the ball's line
full, on off and pushed to short midwicket. Calls early for the single
full, on off, and he looks to drive straight. But it hits the inside-half of the bat, and rolls back towards the non-striker
full and wide outside off, and he meets the ball with soft hands. Opens the bat's face and taps it away to point
full, just outside off, and driven to cover point
yorked, on off, and dug away to cover for a quick single
full on middle, but angling into his pads. Fended with the bat's closed face to midwicket
well stopped! Full, in the slot to drive, and he smacks this through the off side. But the cover fielder dives to his right to stop the boundary

beaten in the flight, Vihari was looking to come down the wicket but Chase shortened his length, Vihari adjusts and thrusts his bat at it
length ball on the stumps, tucked away behind square leg for a couple
length ball, angling in towards the batsman, defended towards mid-on
short of length around off, moves across a bit, and turns it towards short midwicket, wanted a single but sent back by Vihari
length ball around off, defended from the crease
fuller around off, looks to drive through the off side but the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards short midwicket
length ball around off, stays back and blocks down the wicket
fuller on the stumps, Rahane presents the full face of the bat but ends up hitting it straight towards mid-on
short of length around off, goes back and guides it towards deep backward point
short and wide and Vihari cuts again, more power and a touch finer this time, Cummins puts in the chase and keeps it to three
fuller around off, comes forward and smothers it
down the track but Chase throws it wide outside off, Rahane reaches to it and pushes it towards cover
tossed up a bit outside off, Rahane skips again and pushes it towards cover
fuller and in the line of the stumps this time, Rahane uses his feet once more, straight towards the bowler this time
length ball on the stumps, punches it towards long-on from the back foot
fuller on the stumps, lunges forward and blocks
length ball on middle and leg, worked around the corner for a couple, short leg chases it
length ball on middle and leg, turns it on the leg side, short leg intercepts
fuller and down the leg side, goes for the paddle sweep but don't think he connected, Hope fails to collect and that's four byes
fuller around off, driven along the ground towards long-on
fuller around off, turned away towards the right of short midwicket for one
a touch fuller but enough width there for Rahane to go back and late cut it
fuller around off, whipped away towards short leg
fuller again, just outside off, pushes it towards covers
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it back towards the bowler
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
length ball angling in, defends it on the leg side
a touch fuller and on the stumps, Rahane comes forward and blocks again
wide of the crease, a touch fuller around off, Rahane comes forward and blocks
length ball around fifth stump, Rahane comes forward before shouldering arms. Nice carry to the keeper
fuller and wider outside off, a loosener from Gabriel, Vihari leans into it and drives it square of the wicket, substitute fielder Keemo Paul puts in the chase and the slide to prevent the boundary
nips back in from a length outside off, Vihari was looking to cut it away, gets beaten
a lifter from outside off, over head-height for Hope, was left alone by Vihari
a short one just outside off, Vihari sways away from the line
wasn't too far away from the off stump, kept coming in with the angle after landing on a length, Vihari leaves it alone
fuller outside off this time, and Vihari presents a full face of the bat, between the bowler and a very straight extra cover and collects four
pitched up around off, pushes it towards cover from the front foot
length ball coming in to the batsman, Rahane was looking to work it on the leg side, it bounces a bit extra and forces the batsman to take off the bottom hand, a single in front of square leg
length ball angling on to the pads, Rahane moves across to flick but misses, gets four leg-byes though, there was an appeal for lbw but was heading down
length ball on the stumps, defended from the front foot
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, comes forward and defends towards cover
goes for the yorker but ends up bowling a low full toss on the stumps, once again full face of the bat for Vihari, this time between the bowler and the short midwicket
length ball around off, kept a touch low, Vihari was stuck in the crease but gets his bat down in time
fuller around off, driven back towards the bowler who gets a hand to it, a single off the deflection
short of length near waist height, Rahane moves outside the line of the ball and works it towards fine leg
short of length angling in, Rahane stays back and chops it towards point
wide of the crease, length ball around off stump, Rahane dabs it towards midwicket and sprints back for the second before the fielder from deep comes in
length ball in the corridor, left alone by Vihari
fuller and swinging in, Vihari was looking to play down the ground, the ball hits the inner half and goes towards short midwicket
this one moves away a bit from a length outside off, Vihari was pushing at it and gets beaten
length ball in the corridor, angling in this time, left alone
what a beauty, coming in with the arm, pitching on a length around off and moving away, Vihari plays for the line and gets beaten
beaten once more! A length ball in the channel, Vihari is stuck in the crease, pushes again and misses
fuller on the pads and clipped away towards deep backward square leg, Chase protecting that area
fuller and in the corridor, coming in with the angle, shouldered arms
length ball around off, stays in the crease and drops it on the off side for a quick single
length ball angling in around off and middle, tucked away towards midwicket for a couple of runs more
length ball around off, and coming in, some extra bounce to surprise the batsman who was looking to cut it, gets cramped and chops it in the end
length ball around off, gets on his toes and dabs it towards square leg, a loud call of no straightaway
full, just outside off stump, and defended off the front foot to cover point
full, on off, and angling into his stumps. Defended with soft hands
full, but wide outside off stump. Left alone
length ball, seaming into his body, but fended with the bat's open face to deep point
length ball, angling into his pads, and worked away to square leg
good length, on off stump, and defended
length ball, just outside off, and left alone
length ball, close to off stump, and he bends his knees to cut through the ball. Well stopped by the diving fielder at point
length ball outside off,  and tapped gently to the gap near point for a quick single

full, just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to defend. Ball sneaks through the slip cordon, and two fielders give the ball a mighty chase. Brooks did well to parry the ball back before diving into the boundary
good length, too wide outside off, and he shoulders his arms
length ball, angling into his body, and defended off the back foot
full, on middle, and tapped into the leg-side
full, on middle, and he covers his stumps before defending towards the non-striker
full, on middle, and he misses the flick. Ball hits his front pad, but the angle was going to take it down
full, just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward. Blocks it firmly, but the ball hits the inside-splice of his bat
length delivery outside off stump, and fended away to cover
length ball, on off and turning into him. Fended off the back foot towards Rahane
full, on off, and worked with the turn to the leg side
length ball outside off stump, and turning inwards. Left alone
full, on middle, and he tries to sweep. Misses as the ball goes past the leg side
full, on off, and he meets this on the front foot. Defended towards the leg side
length ball, just outside off. He waits on the back foot before flicking behind square to fine leg
full, just outside off, and he defends with soft hands to cover
full and wide outside off, and that allows Rahane to free his arms. Crunches a cover drive through the two infielders for four
through to the keeper this time
length ball, angling in, and guided to point with soft hands for a single
full, on middle, and drilled to mid-on. Intercepted by the fielder
full, just outside off stump, and left alone
full, just outside off, and he caresses a drive to wide long-on
wide outside off stump, and he cuts off the back foot - with the turn - to deep point
length ball, just outside off, and he works this away to midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and he defends
full, just outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drive. Through to long on
full, just outside off, and he defends this after covering his stumps
full, just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to work it towards deep point
back of a length, on middle, and he ducks under the ball's line
full on middle, and angling down leg. He flicks off his hips down to fine leg
full, just outside off, and he drives off the front foot past the bowler. Stopped by mid-off
full, on middle, and nurdled off his pads. Stopped by midwicket
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square to deep point
full, on off, and he reaches forward to push. Straight to cover
overpitched on off, and he skips down the ground to place this beautifully past long on's right
full, on middle, and driven to long on for a walking single
full, just outside off stump. defended back to the bowler
full, wider outside off stump. Fended off the front foot
full, on off stump, and he comfortably drives to wide long on
full, just outside off, and he defends this with soft hands to cover
length ball outside off, and he opens the bat's face to work a shot towards short third man
back of a length, just outside off, and punched to cover on this occasion
full outside off, and swinging away. Left alone
full outside off stump, and left alone by the batsman
length ball outside off, and he tries to cut. Misses
full, just outside off, and driven to long on for a single
length ball, on off, and fended off the back foot
length ball, going down leg, and he swivels to pull along the ground - past short fine leg
full, wide outside off, and drilled through the midwicket cordon for a boundary
full, just outside off, and driven to long on
back of a length, on off stump, and he ducks under the ball
full, on middle, and nudged square to fine leg for a single
back of a length, on the fourth-stump channel. Defended with soft hands
length ball outside off, and the ball hits the bat's shoulder to point
length ball, angling into him, and guided to the leg side
full, on off, and driven to long off. Nobody there, so four to Vihari. Fifty tor him
full, just outside off, and driven down the ground to long on for a single
full on off stump, and worked with the turn to midwicket
full, on off, and turning into his pads. Flicked to the leg side
full and wide outside off, and he gets to the pitch of the ball before defending
length ball on off, and he guides it with the turn to square leg for a single
full, just outside off, and bunted away to cover
full, on leg stump, and driven to long on for a walking single
full, on leg and clipped to the leg side. Midwicket gives it a chase
overpitched on off, and he tries to drive. Hits the bottom-half of the bat and rolls to mid-off
full, just outside off, and he strokes a drive to mid-off
full, on middle, and driven down the ground. Stopped by the bowler
angling in, length ball, and flicked to the leg side
full, just outside off stump. Defended
length ball, just outside off, and he awkwardly defends due to the extra bounce
full outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drill a cover drive. Finds the fielder
length ball, angling across the right-hander, and defended after shuffling across
length ball, on off, and defended off the back foot
overpitched, on off stump, and driven to cover
length ball, on middle, and nudged square to deep midwicket
full outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to drive
full, outside leg stump, and swept past leg slip for a boundary
length ball, on middle stump. Defended off the back foot
full toss, on the leg stump. Drilled to deep midwicket. Hundred stand as the teams break for lunch
fuller around off, comes forward and works it towards square leg
length ball outside off, some extra bounce there but Vihari does well get on the top and cut it behind point
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it with soft hands
length ball around off, goes deep in his crease and whips it towards deep midwicket
fuller around off, driven towards long-on for an easy single
a full toss around off this time, Vihari skips down the track and hits it wide of mid-on for four
length ball around off, moves away a bit as Rahane pushes forward, a thick outside edge towards cover-point
length ball around off, stays in the crease and pushes it on the off side
fuller on the pads and flicked away towards deep backward square leg
length ball around off, pushes it towards point from the crease
length ball around off, moves towards the off side and steers it towards sweeper cover

what a delivery, but alas! no edge. Was a length ball in the corridor, Vihari looks to chase it with hands, but the ball moves away off the seam to beat the bat. On another day, Roach would have taken five
fuller on the stumps, drives down the ground and they come back for two, 300 comes up for India, Rahane moves to 97
length ball around off, stays back and defends on the off side
down the track but gets too close to the ball, digs it out towards extra cover for one
Vihari too uses his feet and drives it between the stumps and the non-striker, beats mid-off and Bravo from long-on cannot cut it off
fuller around off and swept behind square leg
pitched up around off, Rahane comes forward and drives it towards long-on, moves to 99 and keeps strike
length ball around off, pushes towards the off side, a loud call of no
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and flicks, was in the air for a while but well short of the short midwicket fielder. Roach has his face covered with his hands
fuller on the stumps, pushes down the wicket but mid-on is quick to the ball

and that's his tenth Test match hundred, first in two years. Was a length ball around off, dabs it behind square leg and sprints across for a single. No big celebrations but a big relief, looks skywards and hugs his partner
length ball outside off, goes for the cut but finds backward point
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards the wide long-on, Keemo Paul chases but mistimes his dives
fuller on the stumps, clears his front leg and flicks, the ball tails in and finds short midwicket
short and wide outside off, and Vihari just helps it over the slip fielder, and it goes all the way for a six
short and wide outside off, Vihari just helps in over the slip fielder and it carries all the way
length ball around off, a solid defence on the off side
fuller on the stumps, looks to flick away but gets a leading edge towards covers
fuller and in the corridor, left alone
fuller but down the leg side, Vihari goes for the flick but misses, the ball brushes his pads on its way to the keeper
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks, the ball hits the splice of the bat
fuller around off once again, defended on the front foot
a bouncer this time from Roach but Vihari had no trouble ducking under it
fuller around off, looks to drive on the off side, the ball hits the inner half and dribbles towards mid-on
in the corridor, just holding its line after pitching on a length, Vihari pushes at it with hard hands and gets beaten. More frustration for Roach
length ball around off, looks to flick away but misses and gets hit on the thigh
fuller outside off and Rahane looks to go over extra cover, toe-end of the bat and therefore just clears the mid-off fielder

length ball around middle, Rahane shuffles across and looks to flick, misses. An appeal for lbw by the bowler, given not out but Holder decides to review it. No bat involved and Hawk Eye says it would have clipped the top of the leg stump. Umpire's call and therefore, Rahane survives
fuller on the stumps, pushes it back towards the bowler
a bouncer this time from Gabriel. Aimed at the batsman but Rahane does well to sway away from it

a bit fuller around off, looks to go aerial once again, and gets it from the toe-end once again, Holder moves to his left from mid-off and takes an easy catch. Vihari runs towards Rahane to congratulate him
short of length around off, chops it towards point
length ball around off, goes down the ground and looks to hit it towards mid-on, misses
fuller around off, clears his front leg and drives along the ground, a single to long-off
fuller and slanting across, comes forward and drives towards cover
short of length outside off, cuts it behind point and sprints back for the second. India's lead is now 400
dropped. Short of length around off, Pant goes for the uppercut but it's too close for him. Hope jumps, stretches his right hand, reaches there but cannot latch on to it
length ball on middle and leg, flicked away towards fine leg
a bouncer at the batsman, 138kph, Vihari ducks under without any fuss
length ball around off, stays back and drops it towards backward point for a quick single
short of length on the leg stump, goes for the pull but he is in no position, the ball lobs towards short fine leg
a low full toss outside off, Vihari was shuffling across but had to bunt it back towards the bowler in the end
another bouncer, angling towards the batsman, Vihari once again ducks under
fuller and wider outside off, clears his front leg and digs it out towards mid-off
short of length outside off, dabs it wide of first slip
length ball, wider outside off, throws his bat at it but ends up slicing it towards third man, one-bounce to the fielder

short of length, angling towards the batsman, Vihari goes for the pull but gets a top edge towards fine leg, the fielder charges in but it lands short, the fielder fails to get his body behind it and concedes a boundary
a low full toss on the stumps, Vihari moves away and mistimes it down the ground
fuller outside off, gives himself some room and smashes it, finds extra cover though
length ball down the leg side, plays it towards short fine leg with soft hands to bring Vihari back on strike
fuller and wider outside off, fired in quick. Vihari fails to get his bat on it
short of length outside off, some extra bounce there, dabbed towards short third man

a brilliant sliding catch by Keemo Paul at deep backward square leg, was a length ball Pant went for aerial sweep, Paul sprints to his left from deep square leg and completes the catch. Fourth wicket for Chase
full and wide outside off, and he hammers a drive to wide long off
full, on off stump, and he slog-sweeps past the diving Holder - at midwicket - for four. Moves into the nineties
full, on middle, and pushed past midwicket
back of a length, outside off, and he ducks under this one

falls seven runs short of a maiden Test ton! Length ball on middle, angling down leg, and Vihari swipes at this. But the ball takes an under-edge and goes through to the keeper's gloves. Not the way India would've wanted to end their innings but Virat Kohli has declared
full, on middle, and swinging down the leg side to Pant
full, just outside off but swinging inwards. Defended from middle stump
length ball, wide outside off, but big swing inwards. Tries to punch, but inside-edges it to fine leg instead
length ball outside off, and seaming away. Sticks his bat out and tentatively cuts it past point for the innings' first four

full, just outside off, and he pushes for a drive. Edged to second slip, who takes an aim at the batsman's stumps! It hits the wicket, and the TV umpire is checking for a run-out. This is smart from Kohli, who saw the batsman hovering outside the stumps for a moment, but when the ball hit the wicket, Campbell had already brought his bat down
driven with the bat's open face to deep point
length ball, on middle, and he rides the bounce to defend it
length ball outside off stump, but going straight through to the keeper
full, on middle, and he presses forward to block. Tapped to cover for a quick single
there's the first one! Fullish, in the channel outside off stump, and tries to fish at this. Takes the outside edge, and straight into the keeper's gloves
full, very wide outside off, and swinging further away. Left alone
length ball, on off, and he covers his off stump before defending off the back foot
full, just outside off from around the wicket. He shuffles across before shouldering his arms
length ball, outside off stump, and seaming away. Left alone
full outside off stump, and he presses forward to drive. Past his outside edge!
full, on off stump, and he walks down the ground to defend
full, just outside off, and defended with soft hands to cover
length ball, just outside off and seaming away. Taps it gently to the fielder at backward point
length ball angling in, and worked off his hips past the square-leg umpire
length ball on leg stump, and the batsman is surprised by some extra bounce. Mistimes a leg-side flick to square leg
full, just outside off, and he drives past the cover region. Just a single though
full, on middle and angling further across the batsman. Campbell's happy to let it go

make that two! Classic delivery, full on off stump and swinging into the left-hander. Campbell tries to drive straight, but the ball goes between bat and body and dislodges his middle stump. Bumrah celebrates like \_()_/
full, on leg stump, but he misses the leg-side clip. Hits his front leg, but they don't appeal much. Probably swinging down the leg side

appeal for lbw, and the umpire raises his finger! Full, on middle, but swinging into the batsman's pads. He misses the on-drive, with the ball hitting his back leg. Brooks chats with Bravo and eventually chooses not to review. West Indies 10 for 3
full outside off stump, from around the wicket. Ball moves away after hitting the deck, and left alone by the batsman
full, just outside off, and he pushes forward to defend. But the ball moves away oh-so-slightly, and very nearly takes his outside edge. A collective groan from the slip cordon
full, outside off, and driven with the bat's open face to point. Jadeja dives to stop the run
length ball on off stump, cramping Hetty. Nudged off his hips to square leg for his first run
back of a length, on middle, and some extra bounce surprises Bravo! Ducks, slightly, and the ball flies over his head. Pant jumps - with one hand sticking out - to stop the bye runs
length ball landing on leg stump and angling across. Tapped away to cover
full, on middle, and angling across the batsman's outside edge once again

dropped by the India captain! Length ball angling across, and the batsman tried to defend, but it flew off his edge. Kohli, at third slip, tries to pocket it, but it hits his hand and bounces out. Rahul, at second slip, fails to take it on the rebound as well
full outside off and angling across. Left alone
full on off, and takes a big bounce into Pant's gloves
through to the keeper
full outside off, and swinging away. He shuffles across but chooses to eventually shoulder his arms
full, just outside off stump, and he shoulders his arms
full, on off stump, and blocked off the front foot
full, on leg stump, and he nicks this past the keeper's right. Pant dives to his right and gloves it away
full, just outside off stump. Defended with soft hands. Overstepped though

Rahane makes up for Kohli's drop! Full, hovering outside off stump, and Hetmyer can't resist a drive. Takes the edge, and third slip takes a catch, reverse-cupping his hands like the Australians. Virat Kohli breathes a sigh of relief
flicked off his toes to the fielder at fine leg. Gets off the mark
full outside off stump. Let alone
full, on off stump, but swinging into his pads. Bravo looks to drive from off stump, but the ball - once again - finds the gap between bat and body. This is magical bowling
length ball in the corridor, left alone, nice carry to the keeper
length again, around sixth stump, shouldered arms by Hope
much closer to the batsman this time, Hope was looking to play at it but doesn't commit himself and the ball moves away to beat the bat
fuller on the stumps and swinging in, flicked away behind square leg for four
length ball in the corridor, Ishant corrects his line, left alone
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
short of length outside off, Chase stands tall and punches it towards deep backward point
a bouncer from Ishant, pitched outside off and angling in, Chase ducks under
another inswinger on the pads, Chase misses the flick on this occasion but gets four leg byes to fine leg
fuller on the stumps and angling in, Hope goes for a flick, was in the air for a while but safe, collects a single to midwicket
fuller again, around fifth stump and swinging in, left alone by Chase
fuller on the pads, angling on to the pads this time, Chase misses the flick and is hit on the pads but it was going down
length ball in the corridor, left alone by Chase
length ball around off, stays on the back foot and blocks
fuller around off, stays in the crease and pushes it towards extra cover
length ball in the corridor, pushes at it and gets beaten
length again, around sixth stump, ignored
length ball just outside off, defended from the back foot

cuts him in half, a loud appeal for caught-behind, but the umpire is unmoved. Pant is quite confident but India choose not to review. Was a length ball around off that swung in sharply to go through the gap between the bat and the pad. Replays show it brushed the pad though
fuller this time, pushed from the front foot
fuller around off stump, Hope gets low to keep it out

off stump takes a walk, Bumrah is on fire. West Indies six down for 27. Was a length ball around off, Hope played for the line but it moved away enough to beat the outside edge and clatter into the off stump

fuller around off, Holder was in two minds, tries to withdraw at the last moment, the ball dribbles towards slips off the face of the bat. A direct-hit at the striker's end but Holder was in his crease
beaten outside off, length ball outside off, looks to defend but misses
a touch fuller outside off and moving away, left alone
length ball coming in to beat the batsman and rap the batsman near thigh, an appeal for lbw but that was going way down, West Indies collect a leg bye though
brilliant again from Bumrah, was a length ball outside off, Chase looks to defend on the front foot but gets beaten as the ball moves away
fuller and moving away but way outside off, left alone by Holder
falls just short of Vihari at backward square leg, was fuller on the stumps and swinging in, Holder goes for the flick, cannot keep it down but lands just short of the fielder
length ball in the corridor, Holder leaves it alone
fuller around off, comes forward and defends

dropped by Vihari at backward square leg. Was a short of length ball at the batsman, Holder goes for the pull but is not in full control, the ball travels fast to Vihari's right who gets both hands but cannot latch on to it
length ball in the corridor, swinging in late, left alone
fuller around off and coming in, Holder comes forward and blocks
fuller but sliding on to the pads this time, Holder misses the flick, a leg bye as the ball rolls to Pant's left
length ball pitching outside off and moving further away, left alone
fuller around off and middle, Chase stays in the crease and blocks
fuller on the stumps Chase once again defends it solidly
length ball on the stumps, a hint of movement away, blocked from the crease
length ball outside off, Holder pushes at it but gets beaten
a touch fuller and closer, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the stumps, blocked from the back foot
length again, angling in towards the batsman, defended from the back foot once more
short of length on the stumps, goes back and pulls it over midwicket for four
fuller outside off this time, Holder comes forward and drives it towards sweeper cover, Rahul cuts it off to keep it to three
length ball around off, stays inside the crease and defends on the off side

that's a five-for for Bumrah, he points to the name on his shirt. And what a ball it was, fuller around off, Holder was stuck deep inside his crease, looks to defend but it moves away to hit the off stump
fuller but down the leg side, brushes the pad on its way to the keeper
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length ball angling in, beats the bat and hit the batsman near the knee roll. A loud appeal for lbw but denied. India want to review this. Replays show it would have missed the leg stump
length ball around off, moving away after pitching, defended by Roach
length ball outside off, punches it square off the wicket from the back foot
angled in on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
straying on the pads once again, flicked away behind square leg, comes back for the third
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, Roach clears his front leg and smashes it over the bowler's head, four to long-off
length ball around off, defended on the off side
length ball in the corridor and moving away, left alone
length ball outside off and swinging away, left alone
length ball around off, stays behind the line and blocks
length ball around fifth stump, Chase comes forward to defend but gets beaten as it moves away a little bit but enough to miss the outside edge
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball around off and swinging in, gets the inner half of the bat, a single to square leg
fuller around off, once again swinging in, Chase comes forward and drives it towards mid-off
fuller around off, comes forward and taps it towards extra cover for a quick single
fuller around off, Roach shuffles across and flicks it towards short midwicket
goes for the yorker but just misses his mark, Roach gets his bat down at it
fuller around off, pushes it into the covers for one
length ball around off, moves across and flicks it towards deep backward square, 50 is up for West Indies, looked like an ironic cheer from the crowd

now Shami gets among the wickets, West Indies' last recognised batsman departs. Length ball around off, coming in with the angle, Chase was playing for the line but the ball just holds its line and clatters into off and middle. The umpires want to check for a no-ball but Shami is alright there
back of a length, super high, and Pant sticks his hand out to stop the ball. Very nearly dribbled onto the kepeer's helmet
full, angling into his legs, and flicked to square leg
full, just outside off, and he crunches a straight drive back to Shami
there's the ninth wicket! Length ball, just outside off, and the back-foot punch takes his outside edge. Easy for Pant
back of a length, on middle, and angling down the leg side
back of a length, outside off stump, and he hooks this over deep midwicket!
full, on off and tapped to wide mid-on

and that's the win! Or is it? Roach has reviewed this lbw decision. Length ball outside off but angling into off stump. Roach shuffled across the stumps - exposing two stumps - and the ball hit his front leg. But replays show the ball is just missing the top of the stumps. The umpire needs to change his decision.
yorker, on off, and dug into his own boots by Roach
length, wide outside off, and he goes for a wild swing of the bat. Misses altogether
full on middle from around the wicket, and going down the leg side. Sharp take from Pant running to his right
back of a length on off, but the ball doesn't bounce so much. Cummins ducks, but the ball barely goes over the stumps
full, just outside off, and he prods forward to defend
full, on middle stump, and a bit of late inswing. Defended firmly
length delivery, swinging away from the batsman. Left alone
length ball angling across from middle stump. He shoulders his arms
full, on off stump, and tonked over long off! Clears the front foot, and hammers it for a six
full and wide outside off stump. Roach connects well once again, flat-batting a maximum over long on
full, on middle, and defended off the front foot
length ball, on off, and defended
